summary: This cluster centers on a visual analytics framework that extends the **Granger causality test** to support **dynamic, noise-resistant causal analysis of urban time-series sensor data**. It describes the system’s **user-centered design**, visualization features, and iterative expert validation for exploring **causal relationships among urban sensors**.

This cluster centers on **Compass**, a **visual analytics system for detecting, visualizing, and interpreting dynamic causal relationships in urban time series data**. All sentences describe **different interactive views, detection methods, and visualization techniques** within Compass, jointly explaining its **integrated framework for spatial-temporal causal analysis and validation**.

**Summary:**  
All sentences describe *Compass*, a visual analytics system for detecting, partitioning, and visualizing dynamic causal relationships in urban time series data. They collectively focus on methods for time partitioning, causal graph construction, and interactive visualization to help experts explore temporal and spatial causal patterns.
